_sText:
<embed width="430" height="389" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://s299.photobucket.com/flash/player.swf?file=http://vid299.photobucket.com/albums/mm300/blacksheep987/yeas-1.flv"></embed>

Map was created for 66 tic and airaccelerate of 150 may work fine with 100 tic but level 4 ramps may become glitched

Points System:

Fail on all levels is -1 to score
lvl 1 pass +3
lvl 2 pass +4
lvl 3 pass +5
lvl 4 pass +6
lvl 5 pass +7
Pacman 
   -no points on this game
Cannon Game 
     -amount of ring value player goes 
     though you get that amount of points to score
Bowl Over 
      -Each pin or person clutter is worth 10 points
Air Hockey
      -Puck in hole is 10 points
Slam-a-winner
      -Amount ball goes though is amount of points you get

Tips and Tricks

Level 1
     -Platform is on back of last pillar
Level 2
      -On the upward spiral be very small circle to make it 
      all the way to the top
Level 3
      -Crouch on first ramp
      -Criss-Cross on pillars
Level 4
     -Go when second moving ramp is at top of its climb
     -Stay on ramps as short as possible
Level 5 
     -Stay low on hole part
Pacman
     -Winner kill everyone before they collect the dots
     if they collect them all it kills you
Air Hockey
     -Controls are WASD and as you can guess the arrow is the front 
     so to go forward hold W and it will go in direction of arrow
Cannon Game
     -Direct your cannon at points that you want
     hit the load button
     then fire and wacth them fly
Bowl Over
      -Aim with the <- and -> buttons
      and hit the up one to fire
Slam-a-winner
      -? = 150 points to your score
      -Good luck
Jail 1 (spikes one)
      -deagle above spike pit yes you can get it
      -flashbangs and grenades at top of sides in middle
Jail 2 (ramp one)
      -Always be moving
Opening
      -DON'T PUSH THE BUTTON
      Make others do it for you
      And no you can't get out the window

Plot

It is a beautiful summer day so you and your friends decide to get together and go to the skill surf
park but when you get there it is closed 
You hear a window break, one of your more outgoing friends has broken in and everyone follows 

A VERY BIG SPECIAL THANKS TO BOUNTY CLAN FOR TESTING MY MAP 
 
Cred for name: 
  MercedesBenxx
